sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Login.css"; // Reuse the same neumorphic styling const PaymentPage = () => { const [fullName, setFullName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [cardName, setCardName] = useState(""); const [cardNumber, setCardNumber] = useState(""); const [expiry, setExpiry] = useState(""); const [cvv, setCvv] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!fullName || !email || !cardName || !cardNumber || !expiry || !cvv) { setMessage("⚠️ Please fill in all required fields."); return; } setMessage("✅ Payment successful! Thank you for booking with LiftOff."); }; return (
{/* PASSENGER INFO SECTION */}

Passenger Information

Please enter passenger details below.

setFullName(e.target.value)} />
{/* ✅ Age Field Added */}
setAge(e.target.value)} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
{/* PAYMENT INFO SECTION */}

Payment Information

Enter your payment details below.

setCardName(e.target.value)} />
setCardNumber(e.target.value)} />
setExpiry(e.target.value)} />
setCvv(e.target.value)} />
{/* SUMMARY SECTION */}

Flight Summary

Review your trip details before confirming.

Boston (BSTN) → Vermont (VRMNT)

Departure: Nov 10, 2025 - 8:45 AM

Seat Number: 12A

Total $108.99

{message && (

{message}

)}
); }; export default PaymentPage;
